net.openhft.chronicle.map

Interface IdentifierListener


  • public interface IdentifierListener
    Author:
    Rob Austin.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isIdentifierUnique(byte remoteIdentifier, SocketAddress remoteAddress)
      checks the identifier that is unique and we haven't seen it before, unless it comes from the same port and host.

    • Method Detail

        checks the identifier that is unique and we haven't seen it before, unless it comes from the same port and host.
        Parameters:
        remoteIdentifier - remoteIdentifier
        remoteAddress - remoteAddress
        Returns:
        true if unique
